s: September 12, 2024 - Endless.com was an American e-commerce site owned by Amazon, focused exclusively on shoes and accessories. Amazon closed Endless.com on September 27, 2012, and directed its customers to Amazon.com/Fashion. Endless.com was created in December 2007 by Amazon, as their first separate e-commerce brand.
